subject: Get a Bowflex Home Gym Information Kit & DVD
body:
Get a  Bowflex(R) Home Gym Information Kit Get in shape for Summer with a new Bowflex(R) Home Gym 

http://riskbeak.com/t/q4id6-j-h/283354

Now is your chance to learn about the Bowflex(R) fitness workout that will give you the power to get the results you want. 

- See real results from actual Bowflex(R) home gym users 
- View our informative DVD 
- Learn about our 6 week fitness guarantee 

Get a  Bowflex(R) Home Gym Information Kit, including a DVD and a full-color brochure 
with more pictures and fitness information. More than one million people have 
experienced results from owning a Bowflex(R) home gym. Now it is your turn to feel the muscle, burn the fat and see results, in as little as six weeks.

http://riskbeak.com/t/q4id6-j-h/283354
